name: Plastic Beach VrJam 2022
description:
Plastic Beach solo submission for VRJam 2022.

Stop the waste from reaching the beach, shoot endless/random increasing  waves of trash from reaching the beach.

For Oculus Quest 2.

PBV2.apk was uploaded after the Jam finished and includes an icon and sfx to say/indicate when the waste has been shot, I  also fixed the ending/menu pointer.

Assets used: 

Fonts:

Comication by Tokopress (https://www.dafont.com/comication.font)

SFX:

Dpoggioli: Laser Gun + Reload

Beep by GreenCouch https://freesound.org/s/124905/ CC3.0

Slurp by FranciscoPadilla https://freesound.org/people/FranciscoPadilla/sounds/22788/ cc3.0

Game Music by Dark Fantasy Studios Chuck kick Ass (Under the Mask) Premium License.

Intro Music by GameDev.tv (Desert) Premium License.
